## RFC Summary

Brief description of the proposed feature or change.

## Motivation

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Design

How would this feature work? Include syntax examples if applicable.

## Examples

Provide code examples showing how the feature would be used.

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches were considered? Why was this approach chosen?

## References

Links to related documentation, discussions, or similar features in other languages.
